definition[0]: something very serious that may cause the end of something
example[0]: The computer has dealt a mortal blow to traditional printing methods.
example[1]: Our health service is in mortal danger.
definition[1]: something that causes death or may cause death
example[2]: Near the end of the battle, he received a mortal wound.
example[3]: the screams of men in mortal combat (=fighting until one person kills the other)
